title: DAZ3D BoyfriendSweaterG3
description:
https://www.renderosity.com/mod/bcs/boyfriend-sweater-for-genesis-3-female/115164

The Boyfriend Sweater is a conforming piece of clothing for the Genesis 3 Female. The sweater has been well crafted and most popular G3 morphs have been smoothed and perfected for an excellent fit, however, it will fit and conform to any Genesis 3 character morph using auto-follow in Daz Studio. 

Included in this package
- Boyfriend Sweater (.duf)
- 6 Material Presets
- 6 Texture Maps
- 6 Bump Maps

The sweater comes in 6 different sweater textures, and includes many special shape and fit morphs.

The material presets include shaders optimized for both 3Delight AND the Iray Render Engine. 

Shape and Adjustment Morphs:

Adjust Midline
Neckline Lower
Cup Buttocks
Hip Left Adjust
Hip Right Adjust
LChest_Adjust
RChest_Adjust
LChest_Down
RChest_Down
LChest_SmoothUnder
RChest_SmoothUnder
LShldrBack_Adjust
RShldrBack_Adjust
LShldrDown
RShldrDown
LShldrFront_Adjust
RShldrFront_Adjust
LShldr_Adjust
RShldr_Adjust
LUnderarm_Loosen
RUnderarm_Loosen
Raise Hem Left
Raise Hem Right
Raise Hem
WaistAdjust_Left
WaistAdjust_Right

Thanks for stopping by, and I hope you enjoy the Boyfriend Sweater!

Promotional Credits:

Jolie Heels, by Danie and marforno, Daz
Ana, by RPublishing, RMP soon
